Posts.Content: Hi George and Jackie, Thank you for your reply, it's good to know there are people who understand! This feels like a very lonely time. We managed to contact the hospital today (!) and they have explained the situation a bit further. Apparently it is occasionally given anyway, in the wait for results of the HER2 test, as it does no harm but MAY do good. I guess it makes sense. Thanks again! Clare
